divs: Sighting Detailsfast quick but beatifull,was walking home seen huge glow babyblue light shinning down,over merricmac river ran to house bout hour later seen upbove radio tower bout three them moving back forth like air hockey around 3am sat on porch heard huge explosing 15mins later see water runnning down street .
